headline: BD to Present at the 7th Annual Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that it will present at the 7th Annual Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference on Tuesday, December 3, 2024, at 10:50 am Eastern Time.
